product_name: Imagine Surf Icon XT Stand Up Paddle Board - 10' 2"
long_description: With an exceptionally stable and versatile planing hull, the Icon XT has generous volume and width through the center to beef up stability. It has a progressive rocker that really shines in the surf.
short_description: With an exceptionally stable and versatile planing hull, the Icon XT has generous volume and width through the center to beef up stability. It has a progressive rocker that really shines in the surf.
